Field Detail

listingTitle

public java.lang.String listingTitle
Title of this item displayed on the Filters page

listingIcon

public Bitmap listingIcon
Bitmap for icon used on listing page. null => no icon

color

public int color
Text Color. 0 => default color

contextMenuLabels

public java.lang.String[] contextMenuLabels
Context Menu labels. The context menu will be displayed when users long-press on this filter list item.

contextMenuIntents

public Intent[] contextMenuIntents
Context menu intents. This intent will be started when the corresponding content menu label is invoked. This array must be the same size as the contextMenuLabels array.
